Article.Title: Chatroulette Taken Down Get Ready For Chatroulette V 2
Article.Content: Chatroulette, the service that lets strangers meet over video, has been taken down. A message reads “The experiment #1 is over for now. Thanks for participating – Redesigned and updated version of the website will be launched tomorrow.” We’ve also heard, but haven’t confirmed, that Napster founder Shawn Fanning has broken ties with the company and is no longer advising founder Andrey Ternovskiy.
